formatDescription: Funpaint image file is a raster image format associated with the Funpaint / Funpaint II, an interlaced FLI graphics editor for the Commodore 64. The resolution of the images is 296x200 pixels.
provenanceCompoundName: The National Archives and Records Administration / The National Archives and Records Administration

internalSignatures.name: Funpaint Image File
